cases.title: Login with correct data by clicking "Log in" button
cases.preconditions:
1. Open page [https://kapusta-qa.netlify.app/](https://kapusta-qa.netlify.app/)
2. Use registered email and password

steps.action: Type in correct email and password in a form windows

steps.expected_result: You are successfully loged in. The customer's main page view opens.

cases.title: Add a transaction for a past date - expences
cases.preconditions:
1. Open a website [https://kapusta-qa.netlify.app/](https://kapusta-qa.netlify.app/transactions/expenses)
2. User is loged in with main page view

steps.expected_result: List of expeces is visible

steps.action: Type in data in a product form (product descripion, category and value)
steps.expected_result: Typed data is visible in a form windows

steps.action: Click on calendar icon or a date
steps.expected_result: The calendar shows under a date
Date changes to a chosen one
A transaction is added with a chosen date. The balance is reduced by an amount of the expence.

steps.action: Choose a date of added transaction on a calendar.
steps.expected_result: The transacion is visible on the list

cases.title: Add a transaction for a future date - expences
cases.preconditions:
1. Open a website [https://kapusta-qa.netlify.app/](https://kapusta-qa.netlify.app/transactions/expenses)
2. User is loged in with main page view

steps.expected_result: A list of expenes is visible

steps.action: Type in data in a product form (product descripion, category and value)
steps.expected_result: Typed data is visible in a form windows

steps.action: Click on calendar icon or a date
steps.expected_result: The calendar shows under a date
A calendar should end with a present date. Choosing a future date should be impossible.

cases.title: Delete a transaction for a past date - expences
cases.preconditions:
1. Open a website [https://kapusta-qa.netlify.app/](https://kapusta-qa.netlify.app/transactions/expenses)
2. User is loged in with main page view

steps.expected_result: List of expeces is visible

steps.action: Click on calendar icon or a date
steps.expected_result: The calendar shows under a date
Date changes to a chosen one. A list of expences from that date is shown
A modal window shows with yes/no option

steps.action: Click on yes option on a modal window
steps.expected_result: Chosen transaction is deleted and is no longer visible on a list. Balance changes accordingly

Date changes to a chosen one. A list of expences from that date is shown
A modal window shows with yes/no option

steps.action: Click on yes option on a modal window
steps.expected_result: Chosen transaction is deleted and is no longer visible on a list. Balance changes accordingly

cases.title: Change between income and expences tabs
cases.preconditions:
1. Open a website [https://kapusta-qa.netlify.app/](https://kapusta-qa.netlify.app/transactions/expenses)
2. User is loged in with main page view

steps.expected_result: The list shows income transactions. The form's product category list changes to income.
The list shows expences transactions. The form's product category list changes to expences.

cases.title: Display of the chart after clicking any category in the reports section
cases.preconditions:
1. Open a website [https://kapusta-qa.netlify.app/](https://kapusta-qa.netlify.app/transactions/expenses)
2. User is loged in with main page view

steps.expected_result: The page shows reports screen
A chart for this category displays with the amounts of all items for this category added in the selected month in descending order

cases.title: On reports page the cathegories are shown in descending order by value
cases.preconditions:
1. Open a website [https://kapusta-qa.netlify.app/](https://kapusta-qa.netlify.app/transactions/expenses)
2. User is loged in with main page view

steps.expected_result: The page shows reports screen

steps.action: Change to Income by clicking on an arrow
steps.expected_result: The cathegories of income are shown in descending order by value

steps.action: Change to Expences by clicking on an arrow
steps.expected_result: The cathegories od expences are shown in descending order by value

cases.title: Authorize a user with a google account

steps.action: Click on a Google icon in a registration form
steps.expected_result: A modal window with google login shows.
A user is authoriezed and logged in
